item.title: Find Your Dream Job
item.description: The solution we built For the final project of my Data Science Bootcamp, my team and I created an app designed to empower new commers navigating the Data Science job market. Our app provides: A bird’s eye view of the job market with statistics on: in-demand positions top hiring companies most desired skills Enhanced Skill Insights: users can input a skill and receive related skills frequently mentioned together in job listings.
